simpledb

Class BTreeFileEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.BTreeFileEncoder

  • public class BTreeFileEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    BTreeFileEncoder reads a comma delimited text file and converts it to pages of binary data in the appropriate format for simpledb B+ tree pages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BTreeFileEncoder.EntryComparator
      Comparator to sort BTreeEntry objects by key
      static class  BTreeFileEncoder.ReverseEntryComparator
      Comparator to sort BTreeEntry objects by key in descending order
      static class  BTreeFileEncoder.TupleComparator
      comparator to sort Tuples by key field

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public static BTreeFile convert(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> tuples,
                                java.io.File hFile,
                                java.io.File bFile,
                                int keyField,
                                int numFields)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Encode the file using the BTreeFile's Insert method.
        Parameters:
        tuples - - list of tuples to add to the file
        hFile - - the file to temporarily store the data as a heap file on disk
        bFile - - the file on disk to back the resulting BTreeFile
        keyField - - the index of the key field for this B+ tree
        numFields - - the number of fields in each tuple
        Returns:
        the BTreeFile
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                         throws java.io.IOException

        hFile - - the file to temporarily store the data as a heap file on disk
        bFile - - the file on disk to back the resulting BTreeFile
        keyField - - the index of the key field for this B+ tree
        numFields - - the number of fields in each tuple

      • convert

        public static BTreeFile convert(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> tuples,
                                java.io.File hFile,
                                java.io.File bFile,
                                int npagebytes,
                                int numFields,
                                Type[] typeAr,
                                char fieldSeparator,
                                int keyField)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                DbException,
                                TransactionAbortedException
        Faster method to encode the B+ tree file
        Parameters:
        tuples - - list of tuples to add to the file
        hFile - - the file to temporarily store the data as a heap file on disk
        bFile - - the file on disk to back the resulting BTreeFile
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        numFields - - number of fields per tuple
        typeAr - - array containing the types of the tuples
        fieldSeparator - - character separating fields in the raw data file
        keyField - - the field of the tuples the B+ tree will be keyed on
        Returns:
        the BTreeFile
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DbException
        TransactionAbortedException

      • convert

        public static BTreeFile convert(java.io.File inFile,
                                java.io.File hFile,
                                java.io.File bFile,
                                int npagebytes,
                                int numFields,
                                Type[] typeAr,
                                char fieldSeparator,
                                int keyField)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                DbException,
                                TransactionAbortedException
        Faster method to encode the B+ tree file
        Parameters:
        inFile - - the file containing the raw data
        hFile - - the data file for the HeapFile to be used as an intermediate conversion step
        bFile - - the data file for the BTreeFile
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        numFields - - number of fields per tuple
        typeAr - - array containing the types of the tuples
        fieldSeparator - - character separating fields in the raw data file
        keyField - - the field of the tuples the B+ tree will be keyed on
        Returns:
        the B+ tree file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DbException
        TransactionAbortedException

                                        BTreePageId pid,
                                        BTreePageId rightSiblingId)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        DbException
        Set all the right sibling pointers by following the left sibling pointers
        Parameters:
        bf - - the BTreeFile
        pid - - the id of the page to update with the right sibling pointer
        rightSiblingId - - the id of the page's right sibling
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DbException

                               DbException

        Parameters:
        bf - - the BTreeFile
        pid - - id of the page to update with the parent pointer
        parent - - the id of the page's parent

      • cleanUpEntries

        private static void cleanUpEntries(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<BTreeEntry>> entries,
                                   BTreeFile bf,
                                   int nentries,
                                   int npagebytes,
                                   Type keyType,
                                   int tableid,
                                   int keyField)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Write out any remaining entries and update the parent pointers.
        Parameters:
        entries - - the list of remaining entries
        bf - - the BTreeFile
        nentries - - number of entries per page
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        keyType - - the type of the key field
        tableid - - the table id of this BTreeFile
        keyField - - the index of the key field
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • updateEntries

        private static void updateEntries(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<BTreeEntry>> entries,
                                  BTreeFile bf,
                                  BTreeEntry e,
                                  int level,
                                  int nentries,
                                  int npagebytes,
                                  Type keyType,
                                  int tableid,
                                  int keyField)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Recursive function to update the entries by adding a new Entry at a particular level
        Parameters:
        entries - - the list of entries
        bf - - the BTreefile
        e - - the new entry
        level - - the level of the new entry (0 is closest to the leaf pages)
        nentries - - number of entries per page
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        keyType - - the type of the key field
        tableid - - the table id of this BTreeFile
        keyField - - the index of the key field
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • convertToLeafPage

        public static byte[] convertToLeafPage(java.util.ArrayList<Tuple> tuples,
                                       int npagebytes,
                                       int numFields,
                                       Type[] typeAr,
                                       int keyField)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Convert a set of tuples to a byte array in the format of a BTreeLeafPage
        Parameters:
        tuples - - the set of tuples
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        numFields - - number of fields in each tuple
        typeAr - - array containing the types of the tuples
        keyField - - the field of the tuples the B+ tree will be keyed on
        Returns:
        a byte array which can be passed to the BTreeLeafPage constructor
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • convertToInternalPage

        public static byte[] convertToInternalPage(java.util.ArrayList<BTreeEntry> entries,
                                           int npagebytes,
                                           Type keyType,
                                           int childPageCategory)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Convert a set of entries to a byte array in the format of a BTreeInternalPage
        Parameters:
        entries - - the set of entries
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        keyType - - the type of the key field
        childPageCategory - - the category of the child pages (either internal or leaf)
        Returns:
        a byte array which can be passed to the BTreeInternalPage constructor
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • convertToRootPtrPage

        public static byte[] convertToRootPtrPage(int root,
                                          int rootCategory,
                                          int header)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Create a byte array in the format of a BTreeRootPtrPage
        Parameters:
        root - - the page number of the root page
        rootCategory - - the category of the root page (leaf or internal)
        header - - the page number of the first header page
        Returns:
        a byte array which can be passed to the BTreeRootPtrPage constructor
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
